title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of Seanergy Maritime Holdings Corp

content.text: Seanergy Maritime Holdings Corp was incorporated.
Seanergy Maritime Holdings Corp completed its initial public offering, listing its shares on the NASDAQ stock exchange.
A 1-for-5 reverse stock split was implemented by Seanergy Maritime Holdings Corp.
Seanergy Maritime Holdings Corp entered into a financing agreement with a leading European financial institution.
Seanergy Maritime Holdings Corp completed a registered direct offering of common shares.
Seanergy Maritime Holdings Corp announced the acquisition of several second-hand dry-bulk vessels.
A 1-for-20 reverse stock split was implemented by Seanergy Maritime Holdings Corp.
Seanergy Maritime Holdings Corp entered into a financing agreement and completed a common stock offering.
